# UE-EditorGCButton
A tiny plugin which adds a trash button to the top bar. Use this to run the garbage collector at any time. Collects all garbage, including assets marked with RF_Standalone.

![Screenshot](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1614335/398502139-e1536264-eccf-43eb-aa50-df9e56f6ab71.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CFVmHvRb1ISqZRrvqduvmo71946C6MHZlgbHRrUEJSo)
